Package linalg

Class LUDecomposition

java.lang.Object
linalg.LUDecomposition
class LUDecomposition extends Object
A class which provides functionality for LU factorizations and variants.
Author:
Jacob Watters

  • Method Details

    • exicute

    • LU

      protected static Matrix[] LU​(Matrix A)
      Factors a square or rectangular matrix A into a lower triangular matrix, L, and an upper tirangular matrix, U, such that A = L*U. Note: this method does not use partial pivoting.
      Parameters:
      A - - Matrix to factor into LU
      Returns:
      Matrices L and U from LU factorization. This will be a Matrix array of length 2.
